碊字的基本解释

碊
jiān
山坡。
棚，阁。
移。

碊
zhàn
古同“栈”，栈道。

碊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《集韻》將先切，平先，精。］
(1)棚，阁。
(2)移动。
(3)同“濺”。
(4)山坡。
[②]［zhàn］
［《集韻》仕限切，上産，崇。］
同“栈1”。
栈道。

碊字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　碊； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页832第01
【玉篇】子田切【集韻】將先切，?音箋。與濺同。　又【集韻】財仙切，音錢。坂也。　又【集韻】仕限切，音棧。【博雅】攱也。

碊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
碊字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
碊

hillside.
Shed, pavilion.
shift.
碊

Ancient Tong "stack", plank road.
碊
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Jiyun" will cut first, level first, and fine. ]
(1) Shed, pavilion.
(2) Move.
(3) Same as "splashing".
(4) Hillside.
[②]［zhàn］
["Ji Yun" official limit cut, high production, Chong. ]
Same as "Stack 1".
Plank road.
碊
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　碊; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 832 01
[Jade articles] Zitian cut [Jiyun] will cut first,? Yinjian. Same as splashing.　[Jiyun] Caixian cut, sound money. Sakaya.　[Jiyun] Official limit cut, sound stack. [Bo Ya] Ye Ye.
